=== System Info ===
ASUSTeK Computer Inc <<BR>>
F3Ke <<BR>>
1.0 <<BR>>

*** Asus X53ke
*** AMD Turion(tm) 64 X2 Mobile Technology TL-58
*** 2048MB Ram
*** 250GB 5400rpm HDD
*** 15.4" WXGA Colour Shine LCD Resolution=1280x800
          o Mobility Radeon X2300
*** 4 x USB 2.0, FireWire
*** WLAN 802.11 b/g
*** Flash Memory slot
          o Supported memory types: SD, MMC,Memory Stick (MS, Memory Stick Select (MS Select), Memory Stick Duo (with MS Pro adapter). Memory stick may be "standard" or use "Magic Gate" technology.
*** SP/DIF digital audio out
          o Cable output. Doubles as headphone jack
*** 8X DVD Dual/Double layer Optical Drive
          o CD-R/RW, CD+r/RW, DVD-r/RW, DVD=R/RW, DVD9+R
*** TV-Out port
          o 15 pin D-sub monitor port. Supports standard VGA-compatible devices such as a monitor or projector. <<BR>>
          o S-Video port. <<BR>>
          o DVI-D port <<BR>>

Installation works? <<BR>>
Yes
*** Screen resolution 1024 x 768 during installation, OK after first reboot
*** Restricted drivers for WLAN and display necessary
